title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife announce their separation : NPR
snippet: TORONTO — Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife, Sophie Gregoire Trudeau, announced Wednesday that they are separating after 18 years of marriage.

title: Does Anyone Care About Justin Trudeau’s Separation? - The New York Times
snippet: Like many public statements on ... conversations,” a joint post said, Justin Trudeau, the prime minister of Canada, had separated from his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau....

title: Justin Trudeau and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau announce separation | CBC News
snippet: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, have decided to separate, according to statements posted online by both of them.

title: Justin Trudeau separates from wife, Sophie - POLITICO
snippet: OTTAWA, Ont. — Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau are separating after 18 years of marriage, a high-profile split for Canada’s most recognizable political power couple.

title: Justin Trudeau and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau announce separation | Justin Trudeau | The Guardian
snippet: Canada’s prime minister, Justin Trudeau, and his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, are separating, the couple have announced on Instagram, with a statement that appeared to mark the end of their 18-year marriage.
